trends: There have been 49 other sightings in Huntington Beach
There were no other sightings in Huntington Beach on or around July 7th 2013
Summary: Object captured on film above ocean, not seen with human eye
divs: Sighting DetailsOn Sunday, July 7, 2013, I was photographing both of my sons playing in the ocean at Huntington Beach, California. The time was approximately noon and we were located on the left side of the pier. I took several photographs and did not notice anything in the sky or in the camera lens that seemed out of sorts. Approximately two hours later, we had moved to the north side of the pier (right side) and I again took several photographs. Again, nothing appeared out of the normal. Once home, I began the task of reviewing our photographs and noticed that on two (out of dozens) there appears to be a oval, round shaped black object hovering in the sky. It appears closer in one shot and farther out in the second. I cannot explain these objects. Some plausible explanations have been kite surfers, but no surfers appear in the shots and we did not notice any kite surfers at the time. There are reflections on the object that match the direction of the light. I took several shots in sequence at this area, and these are the only two that they appear in. Which, by my estimates, would somehow put the object in view for less than an eighth of a second.
